data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Smolensk. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Smolensk, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Smolensk, Russia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Smolensk, Russia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 573,630 people in the state of Smolensk who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Karaite people. Make the Jew, Karaite people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 14,956 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, guide seekers in Smolensk, Russia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Smolensk
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
